item.title: By: bigwig
item.dc:creator: bigwig
item.description: honestly, i don't play wow, but at the same time, how on earth do you put up with wait times? waiting just a couple of minutes seems almost completely outrageous to me, considering your paying a monthly fee. and yet i hear quite often about wait times of an hour or more. how do you let them get away with this?
item.content:encoded:
honestly, i don’t play wow, but at the same time, how on earth do you put up with wait times?
waiting just a couple of minutes seems almost completely outrageous to me, considering your paying a monthly fee. and yet i hear quite often about wait times of an hour or more. how do you let them get away with this?

item.title: By: Thylon
item.dc:creator: Thylon
item.description:
LOL You post some funny things, but this one takes the cake.
Our server has become like that over Christmas, it seems all the little boys and girls who got WoW for christmas decided to all roll on our server jumping our usual que of 150ish to around the 300ish.
GG Blizzard.
item.content:encoded:
LOL You post some funny things, but this one takes the cake.

Our server has become like that over Christmas, it seems all the little boys and girls who got WoW for christmas decided to all roll on our server jumping our usual que of 150ish to around the 300ish.

GG Blizzard.
